chart.title: Life expectancy
chart.subtitle: Average number of years a newborn would live if age-specific mortality rates in the current year were to stay the same throughout its life.

Life expectancy.descriptionShort: Average number of years a newborn would live if age-specific mortality rates in the current year were to stay the same throughout its life.
